description: Detects usage of "xor" or "bxor" in combination of a "foreach" loop. This pattern is often found in encoded powershell code and commands as a way to avoid detection
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Vasiliy Burov (rule)
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
name: Potential Xor Encoded PowerShell Command
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.exe" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND (process.command_line.text:*ForEach* AND process.command_line.text:*Xor*))
